feast noun
(ENJOYABLE THING)
[ S ] something that is very enjoyable to see, hear, experience, etc.: visual feast Her rich colourful costumes make the show a visual feast.feast for the eyes His food is a feast for the eyes as well as the palate.
[ S ] a collection of something to be enjoyed: feast of The team contains a veritable feast of international talent.

a large, special meal, often for many people, to celebrate someone or something: a wedding feast
A feast is also a large meal: We had a feast of fresh seafood.
to eat a lot of good food and enjoy it very much: The two of us feasted on smoked salmon.
